info.short_text: Site gismeteo.ru published the weather forecast in Kirov for Sunday.
info.title: On 18 February, Kirov will have snow and heat

info.short_text: Astropologists made recommendations to all zodiac signs in order to improve health before the forthcoming work week.
info.title: Horoscope of health: Cancers don't need to fall into the dawn, and Scorpions need to wash their hands more often.

info.short_text: The spokesperson for Alexei Naval* Kira Yarmisch** reported that the opposition team confirmed his death.
info.title: Naval's co-workers accepted his death.

info.short_text: Astropologists told me what kind of zodiac is gonna be the last day of the weekend.
info.title: The girls will get calm, and the shooters need to close their homes.

info.short_text: In the city of Kirova, the authorities reported the launch of a campaign to provide directions to the kindergartens of the city.
info.title: On Monday, in Kirov, they'll start sending trips to children.

info.short_text: The Head of State signed a decree amending the document " On the development of artificial intelligence in the Russian Federation " and the National Development Strategy of II.
info.title: Putin has changed the development of artificial intelligence

info.short_text: Two men in a drunken ukhara set up a debosch in a café room, one in Kirov, the other in Kirovo-Cepec.
info.title: The Rosgvardians detained the deboshires who destroyed the cafés.

info.short_text: From June to Tuesdays, Thursdays and Saturdays, a plane from Kirova to Sochi will fly twice a day.
info.title: Reis Kirov - Sochi will be executed twice a day.

info.short_text: The representatives of the Regoperator and the Ecosystem volunteers travelled to the ISA ' s Kira branch.
info.title: Regoperator taught students to split

info.short_text: In Kirovstat, it was reported that the increase in the cost of services to the population had a significant impact on the overall price change in Kirov province in January of this year.
info.title: Housing services cost 3 per cent per month

info.short_text: The Kyrians are complaining about slippers and stops.
info.title: The contractors clean the trail with their hands.

info.short_text: What events in the personal life of every sign of zodiac will happen today, told astrologers in the new horoscope of love.
info.title: The Ovnam will have to choose, and the Koserogs don't need to listen to advice.

info.short_text: There's a new part of the ice franchise in the Russian rental.
info.title: Lead 3: excellent trilogy final

info.short_text: The analysts shared their concerns about the retention rate.
info.title: Experts commented on the CB decision at the key rate

info.short_text: The Deputy Minister of Environmental Protection of Kirov province reported that the foxes were being removed for safety and fodder.
info.title: Kirovans told me why foxes are increasingly reaching people.

info.short_text: The President of the State of Viacheslav Volodin described as responsible for the death of an adviser to the ex-Gubernator of Nikita of the White Alexei Naval* and the European Union. That's what he said in Telegram-canal.
info.title: In Naval's death, Washington and Brussels were accused.

info.short_text: From 17 February to 7 March, in Kirov province, a voter ' s quarter passes begin.
info.title: The members of the beating team will follow the apartments of the kirovn.

info.short_text: For those who do not want to wait for the completion of construction works, there are options for apartments in ready houses in Kyrov ' s areas and neighbourhoods. You can choose a suitable planting and a convenient area for life.
info.title: Simple and visible: overview of apartments in the ready-to-date Kirova

info.short_text: On 16 February, another lecture was held in the administration of the Pervomay region at the Oleg Valentchuk School of Orientists.
info.title: International Women ' s Day will mark the landing of peppers

info.short_text: The Office considered the previous sentence, 27 years ' imprisonment, " too soft " .
info.title: The Office of the Attorney-General appealed the sentence of Darje Trepova, who detonated the Tatar warrior.

info.short_text: In the MFA, the RF commented on the response of the White House and the USG to the report of the death of an ex-gubernator of Nikita White Alexei Naval region.* And it was disturbed that there was no such resonance in the west because of the death of a journalist Gonzalo Lira, who was a U.S. citizen, who was imprisoned in Ukrainian prison.
info.title: Death Naval: response of the west

info.short_text: The man included in the list of extremists and terrorists in the Russian Federation, convicted of several fraud episodes, the “Kirlesa robber”, the adviser to the Governor of Nikita White, the “Kreml Project”, was not named Alexei Naval*. The character, for someone who left a mark in the history of Kirov province, and for someone more in the next region.
info.title: Council of the Whites and the “Kirles robber”, as remembered by the Naval in Kirov
